Installation and system requirements
The &SCSCP; package is designed for &GAP;4.4 and no compatibility with previous releases of &GAP;4 is guaranteed.
To use The &SCSCP; package it is necessary to install &GAP;4 packages &IO; , &GAPDoc; and &openmath; .
The &SCSCP; package is distributed in standard formats (zoo, tar.gz, tar.bz2, -win.zip) and can be obtained from http://www.symbolic-computation.org/. To unpack the archive scscp-0.1.zoo you need the program unzoo, which can be obtained from the &GAP; homepage http://www.gap-system.org/ (see section `Distribution'). To install The &SCSCP; package, copy this archive into the pkg subdirectory of your &GAP;4.4 installation. Then the subdirectory scscp containing the package will be created in the pkg directory after the command
unzoo -x scscp-0.1.zoo
Installation using other archive formats is performed in a similar way.
